name: College Park
fun_fact: Fun fact: College Park's Bagels 'n Grinds uses a special water filtration system that replicates Brooklyn's water chemistry just to make authentic New York-style bagels for hungry University of Maryland students!

hero_dishes.name: Marathon Deli Gyro
hero_dishes.description: Beef and lamb gyro with fries - a UMD institution
hero_dishes.origin_story: Greek deli that's been feeding Terps for generations
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Marathon Deli - also famous for kotopita and Greek pizza

hero_dishes.name: Milk and Honey Shrimp & Grits
hero_dishes.description: Award-winning New Orleans style shrimp and grits
hero_dishes.origin_story: Southern brunch spot bringing NOLA flavors to Maryland
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Milk and Honey - also known for Chicken & Waffles

hero_dishes.name: Li Chun Northeast Chinese Bing
hero_dishes.description: Traditional wraps from Northeast China with Chinese tea
hero_dishes.origin_story: Authentic regional Chinese cuisine rarely found in America
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Li Chun on ground floor of City Hall

hero_dishes.name: Maryland Dairy Ice Cream
hero_dishes.origin_story: UMD's own dairy program making ice cream for a century
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Stamp Student Union - a campus tradition

signature_drinks.name: Bagels 'n Grinds Coffee
signature_drinks.how_locals_drink_it: Study fuel for students with 16 bagel varieties

signature_drinks.name: Li Chun Chinese Tea
signature_drinks.how_locals_drink_it: Traditional tea service highlighting Chinese tea culture

food_culture_notes: College Park Diner open 24 hours for all-night cramming
MidnighTreats has plant-based doughnuts until 1am weekends
Iron Rooster for family-style Southern cooking
$2 billion Greater College Park initiative bringing new restaurants

unique_modern: mix of campus and city development
